name: Dice of Death
description:
The subjects of the Demon Lord destroyed some villages from the Land of Hero. Now the heroes are trying to take revenge against the Demon Lord. It's your turn to lead the Demon Lord to victory. Dice of Death is a turn-based strategy game. Controls:  Esc - Pause Spacebar - interact with player and Buttons Or: Mouse click - interact with player and Button. Monster Abilities: Mimic - Hits all Heroes Cyclops  - Strong Singular Attack Mummy - Reduces Mana  of Target
Hero Abilities: Knight - Strong Singular Attack Priestess  - Heals all Heroes Witch - Hits all Monsters Tank - Stuns target for 2 Turns Credits:
